'''Sam Mackay''' is an actor based in London

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he played the role of a [[Lannister guardsman (Garden of Bones)|Lannister guardsman]]. He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].

He then went on to post a popular AMA on social news website Reddit.
